content: @Richard Kavanagh can you comment on http://gforge.hl7.org/gf/project/fhir/tracker/?action=TrackerItemEdit&tracker_item_id=8902&start=25 please

Updated gforge with the following text

We (NHS England) changed our position on this and have moved away from using urn's and now use canonical URLS.
The proposal to use x-fhir whist pragmatic in nature is possibly not in the spirit of the x- style type of NIDs within the urn standard.
